assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: PKSHA Technology Inc. develops algorithmic solutions in Japan. Its products include Communication Cloud, an AI SaaS that solves various issues in the customer support domain, such as web inquiries and contact center operations; Workplace Cloud, a total solution that links various AI SaaS as a general contact point within the company to create internal DX through internal communication; Chatbot, a chat-type dialogue engine that utilize natural language processing algorithm for the Japanese language; Voicebot, an accurate speech recognition and correction function; and FAQ (frequently asked questions), a cloud-based support solution for creating, publishing, and evaluating frequently asked questions and answers. In addition, the company offers RPA, a technology that automate usual work with RPA; Speech Insight, tool that recognition speech; and AI Helpdesk for MS Teams, a help desk that automates the work and visualizes the log data of inquires exchanged on Microsoft Teams, as well as Sisei Karte, a system that allow users to perform AI posture analysis and electronic medical record management with a tablet or a smart phone. Further, it provides PKSHA security, SCM, and MA/CRM solutions. PKSHA Technology Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
